thread.section_title: Compare Broadband Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Compare Broadband | comparebroadband.com.au
thread.title: Lesley K
thread.title_full: Compare Broadband reviewed by Lesley K

author: Lesley K
title: Lesley K
text:
Still waiting for my internet to be connected, but so far the experience I have had with Compare Broadband has been very good. Alex was excellent in helping me and advising me of the best options for my area and needs. I asked him a question that he did not know the answer to but was more than happy to find out for me. He in turn was glad I asked as he now knows the answer and can use that as a selling point for Belong.
The email updates are very helpful and it appears we may have our internet connection much sooner than expected! Thank you for a great service!
